data.title: Southwest Airlines apologizes and then gives its customers frequent-flyer points
data.meta_description: Southwest Airlines says it will award the travelers who were caught in the surge of canceled flights during the holidays 25,000 frequent-flyer points, an award worth more than $300 in flights.
